posts.post_title: Auctioning and seeking Old Judges of certain Players
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian H (misunderestimated)
I just listed an SGC graded 30 Old Judge "Brown's Champions" of Tip O'Neil on Ebay .....

item # 5162178998 Seller: "Misunderestimated"

And I am looking for Decent Old Judges (much more concerned with front appearance than technical grade although card must at least grade) of HOFers:
Anson, Brouthers & Comiskey as well as "Deacon" White, Pete Browning, Bob Caruthers and Herman Long.  I will also trade for these..... Please email at bhodes@rcn.com .
